A pattern for in-app navigation using a switch statement to render different components based on the
current state. The current page is tracked with `useState`.

**[Open in Play](https://developers.reddit.com/play#-mAMR6uTCEQSMWUBmUGSk2QA4tQcEKcAAhdn8wW0bkhdkjCjQ7kZEp2MCVMDVFp6+oxRrylltGqeTrdHKxAbDUYTXazdQLE7rLa4kL7DGRs4xnBXMi3D4PEBPdQvN7pr5JgFAkFgi48kJQiaw6jwpEotHLSxgSalkKm3mcsmU6nLWn0kvMhL69kdttmo1C36iljiyXS2VNBWeJUQVXqrU67Vs7Tjk2B7QWq22G3lMAiMTECgAOgg2cRemSilc1GSABUnDA3QNILBosoCLBlHoAZpwRL5ogdDt-WAXYHWqRp7xgABlS0iWkeoIJJChbQhWCBAAbXiTxJA9BIAF16gQ5DKA-ZQV2PO0IVeAQ2D0FgQMXGBsL+JhZgoNh5liQiYCyaCyz+NgIDCFQV3gXYcNY9iWUCQYWjqEjPCldSYBkbRsi4iFy2nCBxn08TJJcZVlFksT5LY9MlKGZ0FxaTTmgSHS9Lkv4DCMkyvM0WQID0IwKGsgzxIU+zB2U1TnISVyOI80yygYv5pwoVjfn6GyhmMagJiYUcDOAFi7PuFoUvCw1UQKoqMgGFKpHqu0SV4fgcACoKQpwM9xAYEBCC+claAQFYpCAA)**
